info.name: ZiraAI COMPLETE API Collection v6.0
info.description: Comprehensive API collection for ZiraAI Plant Analysis Platform with ALL 117 endpoints across 17 controllers. No endpoints missing! Updated August 2025 with all recent fixes.

body.raw:
{
  "linkUrl": "https://example.com/products/premium-fertilizer",

body.raw:
{
  "toUserId": 123,
  "plantAnalysisId": {{analysisId}},
  "subject": "Plant Analysis Follow-up",
  "message": "Dear Farmer,\n\nI've reviewed your tomato plant analysis results. The yellowing on lower leaves indicates a nitrogen deficiency. I recommend applying our TomatoBoost fertilizer.\n\nBest regards,\nGreen Agriculture Team",
  "messageType": "Analysis"
}
